ygData.subject: armors
ygData.msgSnippet: with all of the people running around that look more or less the same, i think it is very useful to our rp personas for us to stand out from the crowd
ygData.messageBody:
with all of the people running around that look more or less the same, i
think it is very useful to our rp personas for us to stand out from the
crowd somehow.. right now, with facial features limited, the best way to do
that is with unique armor. i know of several types of armor that are colored
versions of the standard armor type.. i've seen both red and black chain
type armors, as well as bronze, rubicite, black iron, splinted green, and
even blue plate armor. so i'm asking around to see if anybody knows the
locations and or stats on any armor that is noticeably different from your
standard fare.. especially if it isnt "THE best" armor, which would make it
less likely others would wear it :) after all, why would a shadow knight run
around in shiny steel armor when he could wear plate that is blacker than
night..

Beld Demonblade
Fennin Ro
